pullrequest.title: student is never shown how to apply texture and mesh to body and head in  model.sdf
student is never shown how to apply texture and mesh to body and head in  model.sdf

content.raw:
What i submitted is incorrect. Actually it should be from='`/ <material> <!-- Body material -->`/'

It is the entire <material> tag we are trying to add to body visual - similar to previous examples earlier in the tutorial. The xml comments are used to find the correct material tag in the model.sdf for placement into the tutorial page. It is the head visual example below that departs from this approach because the model.sdf file does not have suitable comments for the head visual's <material> element. So yes, the body visual <include> to attribute needs to be modified as mentioned above and the head visual <include> is correct, even though it deviates from other examples for reasons also mentioned above.

The model.sdf I am refering to is the final version found at [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo\_tutorials/src/default/color\_model/files/model.sdf](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/default/color_model/files/model.sdf)

My final thoughts are that since these are significant edits, it might be best that the tutorial author just introduces these changes himself.   But it definitely needs to be done.
content.html:
What i submitted is incorrect. Actually it should be from='/ <material> <!-- Body material -->/'

It is the entire <material> tag we are trying to add to body visual - similar to previous examples earlier in the tutorial. The xml comments are used to find the correct material tag in the model.sdf for placement into the tutorial page. It is the head visual example below that departs from this approach because the model.sdf file does not have suitable comments for the head visual's <material> element. So yes, the body visual <include> to attribute needs to be modified as mentioned above and the head visual <include> is correct, even though it deviates from other examples for reasons also mentioned above.

The model.sdf I am refering to is the final version found at #!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/default/color_model/files/model.sdf

My final thoughts are that since these are significant edits, it might be best that the tutorial author just introduces these changes himself. But it definitely needs to be done.
